definition[0]: a volatile situation is likely to change suddenly and without warning
example[1]: the highly volatile stock and bond markets
definition[1]: someone who is volatile can suddenly become angry or violent
definition[2]: a volatile liquid or substance changes easily into a gas
definition[3]: a volatile market, situation etc is changing quickly and suddenly, for example rising and falling without much warning
example[2]: Bonds started the year in a highly volatile trading environment.
